Hi,

I have newly joined the group. I have a few questions.
Will be greaful if I get some answers/pointers on these - 

Can I test C code using JUnit? Can I use cppunit?
How do I do that?
   - Scope is component functionality testing.
   - Component code runs on host (Windows/linux)
   - Only APIs are exposed.

regards,

Jagmohan
